panels.description: The current number of requests per second

panels.title: Max Response Rate

panels.title: Gas by Iterations

panels.title: Request Latency

panels.description: The size of the HTTP response in bytes
panels.title: Response Size

panels.description: The number of errors received per second
panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: The amount of memory configured for the app
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: The amount of CPU consumed by the application
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: The number of threads in use by the JVM

panels.description: The number of open file descriptors used by the process

panels.title: JDBC Connections

panels.description: The amount of time it takes to invoke the Spring Data repository method to execute a query.
panels.title: Query Latency

panels.description: The amount of time the process has been running.

panels.title: Executor Pool
